Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) are very promising energy conversion devices, producing electricity and heat from a fuel directly via electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency of SOFCs is particularly high, so that such systems are very attractive for integration in complex polygeneration systems.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: In this paper, the integration of SOFC systems with solar thermal collector is investigated seeking to design a novel polygeneration system producing: electricity, space heating and cooling and domestic hot water, for a university building located in Naples (Italy), assumed as case study.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The polygeneration system is based on the following main components: concentrating parabolic through solar collectors, a double-stage LiBr-H2O absorption chiller and an ambient pressure SOFC fuel cell.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The system also includes a number of additional components required for the balance of plant, such as: storage tanks, heat exchangers, pumps, controllers, cooling tower, etc.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The SOFC operates at full load, producing electric energy that is in part self-consumed for powering building lights and equipments, and in part is used for operating the system itself; the electric energy in excess is eventually released to the grid and sold to the public Company that operates the grid itself.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The system was designed and then simulated by means of a zero-dimensional transient simulation model, developed using the TRNSYS software; the investigation of the dynamic behavior of the building is also included.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The results of the case study were analyzed for different time bases, from both energetic and economic points of view.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: Finally, a thermoeconomic optimization is also presented aiming at determining the optimal set of system design parameters.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: The economic results show that the system under investigation may be profitable, provided that it is properly funded.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment

Sentencas: However, the overall energetic and economic results are more encouraging than those claimed for other similar polygeneration systems in the recent literature.
Titulo: Design of a hybrid polygeneration system with solar collectors and a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell: Dynamic simulation and economic assessment
